reasoning: Gastric cancer global incidence from GLOBOCAN 2005: ~9.6 per 100k person-years. Wide geographic variation due to H. pylori prevalence, varies from <2 in North America to >20 in East Asia.
source: Parkin DM, Bray F, Ferlay J, Pisani P. (2005). Global Cancer Statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
